text: G. M. Bhat (born 2 July 1959) is a geologist from Jammu and Kashmir, India. He was the head professor at Department of Geology of Jammu University. In 2020, he was nominated as a member of the Scientific Board of Geoscience Programme (IGCP) by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). == References == Category:1959 births Category:Geologists Category:Indian scientists Category:People from Jammu and Kashmir
title: G. M. Bhat
